timeline.body:
This method needs to be removed.
Instead, use `AbstractAuthenticationHelper.doesUserHasPermissions`

As of today, `JobController` can not autowire `ApiAuthenticationHelper` component, as it is a circular dependency (Requires dependency on module 'com.thoughtworks.go.api-base.main').

To refactor this,
We will need to move the Authorization related to methods from `AbstractAuthenticationHelper` to `SecurityService`.
